experience.title: Geographic Information Systems Analyst

experience.title: Product Developer and GIS Modeller
experience.description: Objective : To build a MVP to measure, manage, and mitigate the physical climate risks at facility and supply chain levels• Obtained and analyzed the dataset obtained from CORDEX to obtain the rainfall intensity used in the model corresponding to future risk• Deployed Semi-Automatic Classification plugin for supervised classification of Land Cover using Google Earth Engine generated DEM• Worked on the automation of HEC-RAS using python scripting PyHMT2D API for the 2D Hydraulic Modelling and simulation of results• Lead a team of 20 frontend interns through ProtoSem Startup Internship Program in developing a complete web application for MVP
experience.description_html: Objective : To build a MVP to measure, manage, and mitigate the physical climate risks at facility and supply chain levels• Obtained and analyzed the dataset obtained from CORDEX to obtain the rainfall intensity used in the model corresponding to future risk• Deployed Semi-Automatic Classification plugin for supervised classification of Land Cover using Google Earth Engine generated DEM• Worked on the automation of HEC-RAS using python scripting PyHMT2D API for the 2D Hydraulic Modelling and simulation of results• Lead a team of 20 frontend interns through ProtoSem Startup Internship Program in developing a complete web application for MVP

projects: [{"title":"Prediction of Monthly Rainfall | Bachelor Thesis Project","start_date":"Sep 2021","end_date":"Nov 2021","description":"Objective : To build monthly rainfall prediction models using historical data of 40 years and various other independent features affecting rainfall and provide a comparative study among machine learning and time series techniques• Visualized the data and performed feature engineering tasks like feature expansion and feature selection based on Correlation Matrix.• Deployed the SARIMAX model identifying seasonality in the data along with exogenous variable used in the multivariate model• Applied various machine learning models withXGBoost outperforming the other modelswith R2 Score of 0.93 and RMSE score of 1.16.• Forecasted the future long term rainfall using non linear XGBoost model to produce accurate predictions comparable to CORDEX dataset"},{"title":"Climate Temperature Analysis App","start_date":"Sep 2021","end_date":"Sep 2021","description":"Objective : To build a web app to display 2 meter air temperature over India Map for a user selected date and time• Extracted the data from ERA5 reanalysis dataset working on a netcdf database corresponding to the user given time and date• Visualizedthedata,convertingshapefiles havingthelatitudesandlongitudesofIndianStateBoundaries,intoPandasDataframe• Plotted thetemperaturevariation using Matplotlib,alongwith Cartopy features andBoundary projections onmap usingshapefiles• Built a dynamic web application using Flask to get the generated plot from the backend corresponding to the user given inputs"},{"title":"Flight Fare Prediction","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"Objective : To model a machine learning algorithm that predictsprice offlight helping in understanding trends in airline industry• Employed feauture engineering, analyzed correlation matrix and feauture importance using ExtraTreesRegressor, creating new features• DeployedLabelEncodingandOne HotEncodingforordinalandnominalcategoricaldataandusedFeatureScalingtonormalizedata• Forecasted the prices using hypertuned XGBoost model with GridSearchCV, with 85.91%Accuracy Rate and RMSE score of 1749"},{"title":"Design of RCC Tower","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"• Spearheaded the group project for planning, designing, analysing and modeling a G+7 residential tower in the city of Gandhinagar• Completed the structural detailing for a beam, column, slab and footing considering the wind load, seismic load, dead and live loads• Analyzed the whole structure using STAAD Pro and designed the Road Network, Plumbing and Size of Overhead Tanks used in the tower"},{"title":"Construction Planning and Management of a Shopping Mall","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"• Devised Architectural Layout for a shopping mall allowing efficient flow of customers maximizing possibilities of commercialtransactions• Appraised the material requirement and calculated Bill of Quantities, thus prepared Notice Inviting Tender as oftraditionalprojects• Forged the Work Breakdown Structure and a Network Diagram, finding the Critical Path and the complete duration ofthe project• Scrutinized an analysis of Network Schedule using PERT Analysis, and planned the Cash Flows, Resource Scheduling using BarChart• Outlined various precautionary measures and safety normsto enact and devised a Maintenance Schedule to monitor quality assurance"},{"title":"Water Audit of Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"• Estimated the design population of Vizianagaram using Census records for a design period of 60 years by population forecasting methods• Organized the data of the Water supply system and Wastewater Management system of the district of Vizianagaram, Andgra Pradesh, which contains water sources, with drawal, water conveyance, treatment, supply, billing, sewage system and sewage treatment• Presented the possible rectifications for the existing Water supply and Wastewater management system of the district of Vizianagaram"}]
